text: (hazrath) Muhammad - salallahualaihiwasallam sirf rasool hee hai, un se pehle bahuth se rasool ho chuke hai, kya agar un ka inteqaal ho jaaye ya ye shaheed ho jaaye to tum Islaam se apni ediyo ke bal phir jaoge? aur jo koyi phir jaaye apni ediyo par, to hargiz Allah ta’ala ka kuch na bigaadega, an-qareeb Allah ta’ala shukr guzaaro ko nek badhla dega
